Title: Trump signs charter of ‘Board of Peace’ at Davos
Summary: US President Donald Trump signed charter of his so-called "Board of Peace" with other founding members in Davos on Thursday . Trump billed the body as a body for resolving international conflicts .

Title: I was insulted for saying Obi can’t beat Atiku at convention – Baba-Ahmed
Summary: Baba-Ahmed had earlier stated in an interview that Atiku was better positioned to clinch the ADC ticket if the process is decided through a convention .

Title: Southern Kaduna Christian leaders declare two-day fast over Kajuru kidnapping
Summary: Southern Kaduna Christian leaders declare two-day fast over Kajuru kidnapping . Two-day fasting will commence on Friday and will be rounded up with a special prayer session in all Churches across the country on Sunday .

Title: ADC Convention: What Peter Obi needs to do  —  Baba-Ahmed
Summary: Baba-Ahmed argued that while Obi remains a strong political figure, his current strategy may not be sufficient in a competitive coalition environment dominated by seasoned political actors .

Title: UK won’t join ‘Board of Peace’ signing ceremony – Minister
Summary: UK won't join ‘Board of Peace’ signing ceremony – Minister . Trump is due to host the ceremony in Davos for the founding charter of his body for resolving international conflicts, which has a $1 billion price tag .

Title: PVC collection only for FCT residents, INEC clarifies
Summary: In a statement addressed to residents of other states on its official X handle on Thursday, INEC urged citizens not to rely on unverified information regarding PVC collection in their respective areas . This clarification comes as part of the commission’s ongoing efforts to ensure transparency, accessibility, and orderly voter registration ahead of the forthcoming local elections in the

Title: 2027: Atiku faults Electoral Act 2022, urges amendments
Summary: Former presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party, Atiku Abubakar, has described loopholes in the Electoral Act 2022 as a major setback to the credibility of the 2023 general elections . The former Vice President claimed that the gaps in the law enabled widespread rigging and made it nearly impossible for petitioners to successfully prosecute their cases in court

Title: Interim Venezuela leader to visit US
Summary: Venezuela's interim president, Delcy Rodriguez, will soon visit the United States, a senior US official said Wednesday . The invitation reflects a head-snapping shift in relations between Washington and Caracas since US Delta Force operatives swooped into Caracas, seized President Nicolas Maduro and spirited him to a US jail to face narcotraff

Title: Police arrest 19-year-old, accomplices for robbery in Oyo
Summary: The Oyo State Police Command has announced the arrest of a 19-year-old suspect and two teenage accomplices . The arrest took place during a proactive stop-and-search exercise by the Command’s Operations Department . The suspects were caught while travelling in an unregistered tricycle, commonly known as “Keke Mar

Title: Fire razes shopping complex in Lagos, no casualties
Summary: A fire outbreak gutted a shopping complex and surrounding shops along Amore Street, Ajegunle, Boundary area of Lagos, destroying goods worth millions of naira . The fire was reported at about 2:40 a.m. via LASEMA’s 767/112 Toll-Free Emergency Lines .
